name: Archdruid
effects: Evergreen Wild Shape: when you roll initiative and have no uses of Wild Shape left, you regain one use
Nature Magician: you can convert Wild Shape uses into a spell slot; each use contributes 2 spell levels
Longevity: for every 10 years that pass, your body ages only 1 year
limits: once you use Nature Magician, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest
